div.div: Cheer on your New York Mets in style with a Tom Seaver Jersey from Nymetsfansedge.com. Pick up Tom Seaver Home, Road, Alternate, BP and Cooperstown Jerseys for men, women and youth. Whether you're showing your longstanding Mets pride, or celebrating the most up-to-the-minute action on the field, you'll look like a true team player when you wear an official Tom Seaver Mets Jersey. Expand your Mets wardrobe and show some love for Tom Seaver with an official Mets Tom Seaver Uniform. All order Free Shipping & Easy Returns.

a.title: Youth Majestic New York Mets #41 Authentic Home Cooperstown Cool Base MLB Jersey - Tom Seaver

h2.a: Youth Majestic New York Mets #41 Authentic Home Cooperstown Cool Base MLB Jersey - Tom Seaver

div.div:
Maximize your comfort and style every time you wear the Youth Majestic New York Mets #41 Tom Seaver Authentic White Home Cooperstown Cool Base MLB Jersey. Crafted with Cool Base technology, this jersey offers the same features the New York Mets rely on to maximize performance. Moisture-wicking fabric and engineered stretch at target spots enhances movement and ventilation to help you stay cool while you cheer on New York Mets this season. Support your New York Mets with this jersey. Support your favorite player, Tom Seaver, with his name and number across the back in authentic tackle twill decoration.
